subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Carlos Sainz won the Central Europe Rally in a Volkswagen Touareg in Veszprem, Hungary. The Nascar driver Robby Gordon was on a team that finished 10th. Sainz and his co-pilot, Michel Perin, completed the seven-day, 1,670-mile event in 11 hours 18 minutes 8 seconds. Stephane Peterhansel was second and Deiter Depping finished third. The Central Europe Rally is the first event of the Dakar Series, started by the organizers of the Dakar Rally, which was canceled this year because of terrorism threats.
